directions: Grind the corn kernels into a fine powder using a blender or food processor.
In a large bowl, combine the ground corn kernels with water to make a slurry.
Let the slurry sit for about 30 minutes to allow the starch to settle.
Carefully pour off the excess water from the slurry, leaving behind the starch sediment.
Spread the starch sediment onto a baking sheet and allow it to dry completely.
Once fully dried, break up any clumps and sift the cornstarch to achieve a smooth texture.
Store the cornstarch in an airtight container for future use.
